channel.title: How do i make gamble
channel.description: How would i make like gamble chests like back then when dds spec had, anyone got the code or something? like for when you click the chest it give it 5k and u try and win 100m or an item. any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 12:10:22 am[/size][hr]MY BAD SORRY WRONG TOPIC!

item.title: How do i make gamble
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I have a complete clue on what it is; the error mean’s that something is not stated inside a class, so you might have the class closed and then adding something outside of the class.

Every piece of code MUST be written inside a class.

class Example { //class start

      public static void main(String args[]) { //main method
      //whatever you want.
      }
      //method's, fields, etc. written here.
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make gamble
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:259967”]Consider Yourself very lucky your getting this I dont normally spill out code!
This is for chest ID 7319 but you can change it to anything you like.
Put this with your case statements in Client.java

case 7319: // gamble thing if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1000000); int Gamble = Item2.randomgamble(); addItem(Gamble, 1); sendMessage("you recieve your prize--there are 11 different prizes"); } else { sendMessage("You need 1M to gamble-- you could win a phat!"); } break;

In Item2.java (or your “random item class”)

Add this.

public static int gamble[] = {995,4587,1205,4151,2412,5698,15352,14109,1187,6107,1042,995,995};

    public static int randomgamble()
    {
    	return gamble[(int)(Math.random()*gamble.length)];
    }


}

The numbers are the Item IDs[/quote]

Not really necessary to edit more than one class; as the code is small enough.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make gamble
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Consider Yourself very lucky your getting this I dont normally spill out code!
This is for chest ID 7319 but you can change it to anything you like.
Put this with your case statements in Client.java

case 7319: // gamble thing if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1000000); int Gamble = Item2.randomgamble(); addItem(Gamble, 1); sendMessage("you recieve your prize--there are 11 different prizes"); } else { sendMessage("You need 1M to gamble-- you could win a phat!"); } break;

In Item2.java (or your “random item class”)

Add this.

public static int gamble[] = {995,4587,1205,4151,2412,5698,15352,14109,1187,6107,1042,995,995};

    public static int randomgamble()
    {
    	return gamble[(int)(Math.random()*gamble.length)];
    }


}

The numbers are the Item IDs
